sourcesContent:
import HomepageHeading from '../HomePageHeading/HomepageHeading';
import getWidth from '../ContainerWidth/GetWidth'
import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'
import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react'
import HeaderPart from '../../../HeaderSegement/HeaderPart';
import '../../../NewOne/Appp.css';
import vk from '../../../Images/vk.png';


const DesktopContainer = ({ children }) => {
  const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false);

  const FixedMenu = () => {
    setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu)
  }

  return (
    <Responsive getWidth={getWidth} minWidth={Responsive.onlyTablet.minWidth}>

      <Grid>
        <Grid.Column width={4} id="sidebar">
          <Menu vertical borderless fluid text>
            <Menu.Item as="a">Reports</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">Analytics</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">Export</Menu.Item>
            <Divider hidden />
            <Menu.Item as="a">Nav item</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">Nav item again</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">One more nav</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">Another nav item</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">More navigation</Menu.Item>
            <Divider hidden />
            <Menu.Item as="a">Macintoch</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">Linux</Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item as="a">Windows</Menu.Item>
          </Menu>
        </Grid.Column>
        
        <Grid.Column width={12}>
          <Image src='/images/wireframe/paragraph.png' />
        </Grid.Column>
      </Grid>


      <Visibility once={false} onBottomPassed={() => FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}>
        {/* <Segment inverted vertical textAlign='center' style={{ minHeight: 450 }} className="custom_desktopContainer" > */}
        <Segment inverted vertical textAlign='center'>
          <Menu className="custom_Menu"
            fixed={fixedMenu ? 'top' : null}
            inverted={!fixedMenu}
            pointing={!fixedMenu}
            secondary={!fixedMenu}
            size='small'
            className="custom_Menu"
          >
            <Container className="custom_containerMenu">
              <Menu.Item as='a'>Home</Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item as='a'>Work</Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item as='a'>Company</Menu.Item>
              <Menu.Item position='right'>
                <Button as='a' inverted={!fixedMenu}>
                  Log in
                   </Button>
              </Menu.Item>
            </Container>
          </Menu>
        </Segment>
      </Visibility>
    </Responsive>
  )
}

export default DesktopContainer;
